p: Three sponsors (27%) reported pandemic or epidemic prior to January 2020 mentioned in their risk assessment at but only at management level. None of the sponsors reported mention of pandemic or epidemic prior to January 2020 in the risk assessment at both trial and management level (0%). The remaining eight sponsors (73%) did not mention pandemic or epidemic in their risk assessment prior to January 2020. This data is shown in FigureÂ 5.
